title: Pride
verses: James 4:6 (WEB) — “God resists the proud, but gives grace to the humble.”
1 Peter 5:6 (WEB) — “Humble yourselves… that he may exalt you.”
Philippians 2:3 (WEB) — “In humility consider others better than yourselves.”
body: Pride isolates and blinds. Choose humility by receiving grace, confessing sin, and serving others. Honor God rather than grasping for glory.
prayer: Holy God, deliver me from pride. Clothe me with humility and teach me to serve with joy, following Jesus’ example. Amen.
